abstract: Jeb Bush decides to emulate the truculent and forceful retorts of Donald J Trump on presidential campaign trail; shows his new vigorous tone during campaign stop in McAllen, Tex,  with acerbic comments on Trump's stand on illegal immigration.
lead_paragraph: After enduring slings and arrows from Mr. Trump for weeks, Mr. Bush is punching back — with force.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Takes a Cue From Donald Trump’s Playbook: Punch Back
headline.print_headline: Bush Takes a Cue From Trump’s Playbook: Punch Back

snippet: After enduring slings and arrows from Mr. Trump for weeks, Mr. Bush is punching back — with force.
